trans-unit.source: Specifies one or more types on the associated collection type that will be used to wrap foreign content.
trans-unit.target: 在將用來包裝外部內容的相關聯集合類型上，指定一種或多種類型。

trans-unit.source: Foreign content refers to cases where the type system constraints on the type of the content property do not capture all of the possible content cases that XAML usage for the owning type would support.
trans-unit.target: 外部內容是指其中內容屬性的型別上的型別系統條件約束沒有擷取所有可能的擁有者類型的 XAML 用法原本支援的內容案例的情況下。

trans-unit.source: For example, XAML support for content of a particular type might support strings in a strongly typed generic <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，XAML 支援特定類型的內容可能會支援字串中的強型別的泛型<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection> is an example of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] class that has the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentWrapperAttribute> attribute applied.
In this case there are two separate attributed wrapper classes.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下有兩個個別屬性化的包裝函式類別。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ContentWrapperAttribute> is in the System.Xaml assembly.
For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that is declared as a content wrapper for the collection type.
trans-unit.target: 宣告為集合類型之內容包裝函式的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ContentWrapperAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ContentWrapperAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type that is declared as a content wrapper for the collection type associated with this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得類型，這個類型宣告為與這個屬性相關聯之集合類型的內容包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: The type that is declared as a content wrapper for the collection type.
trans-unit.target: 宣告為集合類型之內容包裝函式的類型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ContentWrapperAttribute" /> is equivalent this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ContentWrapperAttribute" /> by comparing the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Markup.ContentWrapperAttribute.ContentWrapper" /> properties.
trans-unit.target: 比較 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Markup.ContentWrapperAttribute.ContentWrapper" /> 屬性，來判斷指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ContentWrapperAttribute" /> 是否等於這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ContentWrapperAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Markup.ContentWrapperAttribute.ContentWrapper" /> properties are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Markup.ContentWrapperAttribute.ContentWrapper" /> 屬性相等，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique identifier for this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性的唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的唯一識別項。
